timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-27T11:04:56", "sender_email": "ahmedrabiyya@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Rabiyya, Secure Your UCL Student Accommodation Today!", "message": "Hi,\\n\\nI\u2019m interested in the 239 pounds per week Bronze studio at Pavilion Court London and moving in on the 29th of September.\\n\\nOn 26 Sep 2025, at 09:00, rishabh.m@amberstudent.com wrote:\\n\\n\ufeff\\nHi Rabiyya,\\n\\nWe hope this email finds you well. This is our final call to complete your Student Accommodation Booking. We have reached out to you several times but have not received a response. It's crucial to take immediate action to Secure your Preferred Accommodation.\\n\\nIf you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via Call / Email / Whatsapp or let us know a suitable time to contact you. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to assist you further.\\n\\nThank you for considering our services, and we wish you the best for your upcoming academic journey.\\n\\nNote: Please ignore if already in touch.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi, I'm interested in the 239 pounds per week Bronze studio at Pavilion Court London and moving in on the 29th of September. On 26 Sep 2025, at 09:00, rishabh.m@amberstudent.com wrote: \ufeff Hi Rabiyya", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "ahmedrabiyya@gmail.com"}
